Xin chào! I'm a UX Researcher based in Seattle, WA.

I do research to create inclusive and accessible design. As I work on my crafts, I strive to practice and hone technical skills that enable me to learn and reimagine our relationships with our environments, both digital and physical.

* Xin chào means hello in Vietnamese!

Building communication tools for a human-to-human network
Stakeholder Interview, Survey, One-on-one Interview, Competitive Analysis
How might we facilitate the communication and collaboration between the volunteers at the Nourishing Network community?
